name: Embers of Old Rise Still
desc:
The number of overflow points allowed for "Coreflame" no longer has an upper limit. When the battle starts, gains 6 point(s) of "Coreflame."
After using the attack from "Foundation: Stardeath Verdict," additionally deals True DMG equal to 36% of the total DMG dealt in this attack to the enemy target with the highest HP.
